price: 57. Nous le sauvâmes, lui et sa famille, hormis sa femme pour laquelle Nous avons décrété qu’elle serait du nombre des disparus.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَٰهَا مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnāhā mina al-ghābirīna
